name: Uniwar
description: What is the project about? UNIWAR is a community-centric utility token focused on the aggressive accumulation of revenue generating asset, specifically $UNIBOT in this case. What makes your project unique? UNIWAR gamified staking, multiple revenue streams design and a dynamic tax strategy offers a sustainable real yield asset blackhole. History of your project. No private sale. Fair launch (65% of suuply). Targeted airdrop (23% of supply). Built as a community for a a growing like-minded real yield seeking community. Whatâ€™s next for your project? Real yield and rev sharing gems will be UNIWAR's guiding light. What can your token be used for? The UNIWAR token serves as a utility token within the UNIWAR ecosystem, as it is the core coordinating mechanism for the tax, staking and revenue distribution modules.
